907d5903-0ef1-4a27-9b91-60b1a11f28f6.question:
Tweet: the funniest thing about llms is that they give these large time estimates 

and you can just tell them to do it in 30 mins
907d5903-0ef1-4a27-9b91-60b1a11f28f6.answer: it's wild how easily they cave when you just nudge them a little. i had one tell me a task would take hours, then it was done in like 5 minutes after i said "can you just knock this out quickly?"
